unnormalised: Reliance Jio just announced a new prepaid plan with 2GB data/day. Users are getting pretty hyped online about the "unlimited" calling, but let's be real, everything has its limits, right? The plan costs Rs. 299 & is valid for 28 days.
normalised: Reliance Jio just announced a new prepaid plan with two gigabyte data per day. Users are getting pretty hyped online about the "unlimited" calling, but let's be real, everything has its limits, right? The plan costs rupee two hundred and ninety nine and is valid for twenty eight days.

unnormalised: Also, saw a post about Airtel rolling out some sweet discounts on their broadband plans. Seems like they're trying to compete with JioFiber's aggressive pricing. Someone was complaining about the ping times being too high for gaming, though. Needs a fix, Airtel!
normalised: Also, saw a post about Airtel rolling out some sweet discounts on their broadband plans. Seems like they're trying to compete with JioFiber's aggressive pricing. Someone was complaining about the ping times being too high for gaming, though. Needs a fix, Airtel!

unnormalised: Meanwhile, the govt's talking about net neutrality again. I hope they get it right this time. We don't want ISPs throttling our favorite websites, you know? Remember what happened with that TikTok ban? Total chaos online.
normalised: Meanwhile, the government's talking about net neutrality again. I hope they get it right this time. We don't want I-S-P's throttling our favorite websites, you know? Remember what happened with that TikTok ban? Total chaos online.

unnormalised: And speaking of online chaos, some meme page just got taken down for copyright infringement. Admin's probably scrambling to get it back up. Gotta be careful with those trending templates, folks! Apparently, 3 reports led to the ban.
normalised: And speaking of online chaos, some meme page just got taken down for copyright infringement. Admin's probably scrambling to get it back up. Gotta be careful with those trending templates, folks! Apparently, three reports led to the ban.

unnormalised: Finally, did you guys hear about the new 'metaverse' project by TCS? Apparently it's supposed to be a virtual replica of Mumbai. Not sure how useful that'll be, but hey, at least it's something new to distract us from the rising inflation, LOL. TCS stock also rose by 1.5% after the news.
normalised: Finally, did you guys hear about the new 'metaverse' project by T-C-S? Apparently it's supposed to be a virtual replica of Mumbai. Not sure how useful that'll be, but hey, at least it's something new to distract us from the rising inflation, L-O-L. T-C-S stock also rose by one point five percent after the news.
